issues.description: The component monitors Blazor's built-in reconnection UI via MutationObserver and periodic polling rather than using Blazor's official reconnection handler APIs, which may be less reliable in edge cases.
The reconnection.js file polls for Blazor's reconnection modal every 500ms indefinitely, which could have minor performance implications. Consider cleaning up the interval when no longer needed.
The ReconnectionOverlay component is placed before Routes, but the script is loaded at the end of body. This works correctly with OnAfterRenderAsync initialization, but the order is worth noting.
